mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_student ( student_code, lesson_code, name, email, surplus_lesson_num, remark, create_user, create_time ) VALUES ( #{student.studentCode}, #{student.lessonCode}, #{student.name}, #{student.email}, #{student.surplusLessonNum}, #{student.remark}, #{student.createUser}, #{student.createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id as id, student_code as student_code, lesson_code as lesson_code, name as name, email as email, surplus_lesson_num as surplus_lesson_num, create_user as create_user, create_time as create_time, update_user as update_user, update_time as update_time FROM t_student WHERE lesson_code = #{lessonCode} AND student_code = #{studentCode}

SELECT id as id, student_code as student_code, lesson_code as lesson_code, name as name, email as email, surplus_lesson_num as surplus_lesson_num, create_user as create_user, create_time as create_time, update_user as update_user, update_time as update_time FROM t_student WHERE lesson_code = #{lessonCode} ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{offSet}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_student WHERE lesson_code = #{lessonCode} AND student_code = #{studentCode}
